name: rocketmates/discord-php
description: Discord PHP Library powering the RocketMates Discord Bot.

suggest.cache/apc-adapter: Required to use the APC cache driver
suggest.cache/memcache-adapter: Required to use the Memcache cache driver
suggest.cache/memcached-adapter: Required to use the Memcached cache driver
suggest.cache/redis-adapter: Required to use the Redis cache driver
suggest.ext-libevent: For a faster, and more performant loop. Preferred
suggest.ext-libev: For a faster, and more performant loop
suggest.ext-event: For a faster, and more performant loop
